name: Ruby Heart [Visual Novel / Otome]
description:
Story

Ruby Heart is a "Visual Novel / Otome game" of fantasy adventure with a strong focus in drama and romance. The protagonist, Celty Loweell, travels to a magical underground kingdom in search for a very important person. down there she finds the clues to finally solve a mystery of her past, but also the knowledge to save her future and her kingdom.


Features

+ Approximately 20 000 words long story line. (For now. that number will be many times bigger in the final product).
+ Full screen CG's illustrate key moments in the story.
+ Mystery, Romance, Action, supernatural.

To be implemented.

+ 3 different game routes, including a secret one.
+ 2 endings per route, for a grand total of 6.
